dataList.content: We traversed down the hallway Hong Lu found, walking in awkward, depressed silence.
I've been meaning to ask—are the rumors true?
The rumors that Jia Xichun lost her Heishou Pack.
Hey, who knows. Tell me something valuable, and I just might hand over another coin.
Wang Zhao suggested, gesturing broadly at the coins dangling from himself.
Unfortunately, I lost touch with Xichun after we arrived at Hongyuan.
So I don't know any details myself.
Alright... Okay, I guess we'll see in due time.
As you know, losing your Heishou Pack... is a bigger loss than losing a limb.
If the rumors are true, then she must be having a pretty hard time out here.
Jia Xichun... I wonder if she's doing okay...
She'll be okay, like always. She's a plucky one, after all.
Somehow, Hong Lu ended up comforting Sinclair.
As we continued down the hallway, chatting...
... we eventually found ourselves before a shut gate.
